fields.description: How effectively do you innovate, proactively strategize, and create impactful solutions with emerging technologies, challenging the status quo for global organizational goals?
fields.label: Solution Provider
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Drives transformative, industry-innovating solutions; leads emerging tech adoption; strong entrepreneurial initiative.
4 Master - Crafts innovative, proactive strategies for complex problems; integrates cutting-edge tech globally with deep IT knowledge.
3 Proficient - Develops impactful solutions with emerging tech; aligns to goals; applies IT knowledge for structured outcomes.
2 Basic - Identifies problems, applies conventional solutions; needs guidance with new tech; relies on fundamental IT concepts.
1 Novice - Struggles to identify problems; lacks initiative; relies on existing solutions due to minimal IT knowledge.

fields.description: Which of the following best describes your ability to personify reliability, unwavering dedication to responsibilities, and resiliency to overcome unexpected challenges?
fields.label: Committed
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Role model of commitment; exceptional reliability and perseverance; inspires others with dedication and resilience.
4 Master - Consistently reliable and proactive; overcomes challenges with a problem-solving mindset; dedicated in high-pressure situations.
3 Proficient - Demonstrates responsibility; meets deadlines; manages tasks independently; adapts with some resilience and steady dedication.
2 Basic - Completes tasks with supervision; may need reminders; seeks assistance rather than taking initiative.
1 Novice - Frequently misses deadlines and struggles; minimal responsibility; gives up easily when faced with challenges.

fields.description: How well do you lead the way in using new technologies to achieve digital inclusivity?
fields.label: IT Enabled
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Leads and innovates with emerging tech to drive systemic digital inclusivity; develops pioneering strategies.
4 Master - Actively integrates emerging tech for inclusive digital solutions; advocates for accessibility in transformation.
3 Proficient - Applies emerging tech effectively; considers inclusivity; takes initiative to learn tools but needs implementation support.
2 Basic - Basic knowledge of emerging tech; uses standard IT tools with guidance; minimal engagement.
1 Novice - Limited awareness of emerging tech; struggles with basic IT tools; little to no initiative in exploring solutions.

fields.description: How effectively do you show respect for diversity and practice empathy (malasakit) to enhance customer cultural experiences?
fields.label: Customer Oriented
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Champions strategies integrating cultural sensitivity; leads malasakit; designs user-centric solutions optimizing experience.
4 Master - Anticipates customer needs; ensures a culturally inclusive experience; advocates for empathetic service.
3 Proficient - Responds to needs with sensitivity; aware of diversity; applies malasakit and usability to improve experience.
2 Basic - Basic respect for needs but lacks consistent empathy; requires guidance in diverse interactions.
1 Novice - Minimal awareness of needs, diversity, or UX; responses to concerns are often indifferent or dismissive.

fields.description: Which of the following best describes your ability to demonstrate leadership to inspire the achievement of team goals with open collaboration and respect for new ideas?
fields.label: Team Player
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Leads teams strategically; fosters inclusive communication; drives high-impact IT projects through collaboration.
4 Master - Initiates and coordinates tasks; facilitates discussions; integrates ideas; constructively resolves conflicts.
3 Proficient - Actively contributes; collaborates, listens to perspectives, shares ideas; supports objectives effectively.
2 Basic - Participates; focuses on individual tasks; requires prompts; relies on guidance for coordination.
1 Novice - Struggles with collaboration; works in isolation; disregards team goals; minimally contributes.

fields.description: Which of the following statements best describes your ability to express ideas in an organized manner with clarity, listen respectfully to diverse audience needs, and lead to meaningful dialogue?
fields.label: Good Communicator
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Excels in clear, persuasive, impactful communication; leads diverse discussions; creates tailored reports.
4 Master - Confidently engages in meaningful dialogue; strong listening/facilitation; effectively explains technical information.
3 Proficient - Expresses ideas clearly; adapts style; listens actively; communicates effectively in various formats.
2 Basic - Communicates basic ideas with some clarity but lacks organization; listens passively.
1 Novice - Struggles with clear communication; difficulty listening actively; struggles to articulate computing ideas.

fields.description: Which of the following best describes your ability to express ideas in an organized manner with clarity, listening respectfully to diverse audience needs, leading to meaningful dialogue?
fields.label: Ethical
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Excels in clear, persuasive communication; leads diverse discussions; creates tailored reports.
4 Master - Confidently engages in meaningful dialogue; listens well, facilitates discussions; clearly explains technical information.
3 Proficient - Expresses ideas clearly; adapts style; listens actively; communicates effectively in various formats.
2 Basic - Communicates basic ideas with some clarity but lacks organization; listens passively.
1 Novice - Struggles with clear communication; difficulty listening; struggles to articulate computing ideas effectively.

fields.description: Which of the following statements best describes your level of participation in socio-economic and environmental issues leading towards sustainability, and your positive contribution to national and global development?
fields.label: Contributor to Nation Building
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Innovates scalable CS/IT solutions for challenges; advocates for responsible tech in nation-building.
4 Master - Leads projects addressing national/global challenges using CS/IT; engages with communities for sustainable impact.
3 Proficient - Actively participates in initiatives addressing issues; applies CS/IT knowledge to promote sustainability.
2 Basic - Awareness of issues but limited engagement in sustainability/development; participates only when required.
1 Novice - Little to no awareness of issues; does not participate in sustainability or national development activities.

fields.description: Which of the following statements best describes your approach to undertaking continuous, independent learning and charting a path in pursuit of self-actualization?
fields.label: Lifelong Learner
fields.options:
Select Option
5 Expert - Engages in continuous innovation; mentors others; contributes to knowledge creation (publications, thought leadership).
4 Master - Pursues certifications, advanced studies, or research; shares knowledge with peers and communities.
3 Proficient - Actively seeks new knowledge beyond coursework (self-study, online courses); applies learned concepts in projects.
2 Basic - Demonstrates curiosity but engages only in assigned materials; lacks consistency in independent learning.
1 Novice - Little interest in learning beyond required coursework; relies solely on instructors for knowledge
